programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Caspian: The Hidden Cradle

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Vietnam: Phoenix from the Ashes

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Island of the Devil

programme.title: Wildest India: Ganges: River of Life

programme.title: Wildest India: Thar Desert: Sacred Sands

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel enters the motorcycle world as he tries to turn a childhood dream into a reality by building a wild chopper trike from the ground up.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms an old 1931 Ford jalopy into a street burning hot rod and attempts to bring back one of his wildest creations.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel digs out an old 1960’s dune buggy and brings it back to life with a modern twist.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a beat?up 1955 Oldsmobile into a classic custom. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Answering a distress call leads the crew to pick up Beka's brother, now a Wayist, and his friend.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Banks of the Lethe
programme.desc: A black hole allows Dylan to communicate with his former fiancée, 300 years in the past.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Rose in the Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is imprisoned on a prison planet and must stage an escape as his crew tries to stage their own rescue.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Castalians board the Andromeda to finalize the charter for the New Commonwealth. When the leader is discovered dead, Tyr is the main suspect.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka learns that her father's former business partner deals in a highly addictive drug called F lash.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her sister ship, the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Girl in The Ditch
programme.desc: When 12 year old Agnes Ali'iva'a drowned in a ditch in 1992, the police initially thought her death was accidental. It was four years before public and political pressure forced police to re-investigate her death.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: When The Trail Goes Cold
programme.desc: This episodes involves the disappearance of 62-year-old Kaye Stewart, a woman who went missing while on a short walk on June 13th, 2005.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Mystery of the Homestead Murders
programme.desc: The quick mind of a country telephone exchange supervisor led to a horrific discovery at a NSW country homestead in 1978.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Predator: Leonard John Fraser
programme.desc: Serial killer Leonard Fraser was suspected of killing at least five women over a 17 year period but took the complete truth about his life of crime to his grave.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.desc: On the 6th October 1997, 14-year-old Lauren Barry and 16-year-old Nicole Collins disappeared while walking along a road near their home town of Bega, on the New South Wales south coast.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Moment Forward
programme.desc: One day to go to the wedding of the millennium at Drovers Run. The wedding preparations are a beautiful thing. But the imminent arrival of Nick’s mother, Liz, strikes a discordant note.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Something to Prove
programme.desc: Tess and Nick are on their honeymoon and Stevie is determined to prove she can run the property on her own. Now that she is part owner of Drovers she feels the pressure that holding something valuable in your hands can bring.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: My House is Your House
programme.desc: Whatever happened to domestic bliss? Nick's move into the homestead has Tess feeling like she's been annexed by the invading Ryans.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: A McLeod Daughter
programme.desc: Tess and Nick are on their honeymoon and Stevie is determined to prove she can run the property on her own. Now that she is part owner of Drovers she feels the pressure that holding something valuable in your hands can bring.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Things We Do For Love
programme.desc: Jasmine McLeod (Jaz) came to Drovers to lay her father's ashes to rest. Tess is thrilled to have her cousin to stay but soon discovers that Jaz is haunted by the death of her fiancé Mark.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Love Interrupted
programme.desc: Sally Clements, Nick's ex girlfriend, arrives at Drovers Run with news that is hard to conceal: she is heavily pregnant with Nick's child.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pirates
programme.desc: Fear is spreading at Fort Taber-Fort Rodmanthat a new \\"living history event\\" has stirred up frightening paranormal activity on the park grounds.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Angel of Death
programme.desc: Behind the facade of a beautiful old Inn, lies the haunting memories of a home that was once part of the Underground Railroad, and the family that helped slaves to freedom.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rain Check
programme.desc: For Dog and Beth it's not only another day in paradise, it's their anniversary. Beth is hoping for a romantic dinner with her man, but she knows only too well that for Dog work always comes first.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Love on the Run
programme.desc: Today Dog finds himself looking for more than one fugitive. He starts the day looking for a woman who has skipped out on her court date. But he soon learns that she has teamed up with a woman whose criminal exploits have attracted the local media.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jump Start
programme.desc: Dog gave a break to a young man with a drug problem who promised to enter drug rehab. But this commitment to rehabilitation seems to have ended when he bolted from the car on the way to the drug treatment center and went on the run.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Ice Man
programme.desc: Dog's latest fugitive doesn't think small when it comes to illegal drugs: he was carrying almost a pound of meth when he was arrested. Now he's on the run with his pregnant girlfriend on the high plains of Colorado.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trouble in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog is back in Hawaii and tracking a dangerous fugitive through the jungles of the Big Island. Their prey is being protected by a ring of family and friends that Dog must forcefully confront to bring in his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Power
programme.desc: When Dog decides to spend the day caring for his newest granddaughter, Beth enlists the girls to hunt down a female fugitive. Heading into a dangerous part of town the ladies will use their feminine wiles to track this mother gone wrong.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Si-Yonara
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Barbeque!
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy repo a car from an anger management meeting, Froy suffers the consequences of taking on a violent rage-aholic.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Up in Flames
programme.desc: A jazz musician sets off Sonia and punches are thrown as Ronnie tries to manage the mayhem, and Matt and Sonia wrestle to bring deluded actors back to reality.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Games
programme.desc: When Rusty leads Sonia and Ronnie on a wild goose chase, Sonia loses her cool and puts her foot down with Lou.

programme.title: Operation Repo: T-Bone Trouble
programme.desc: The team's work with anger management starts to pay off - with disastrous consequences. Matt and Sonia get into a standoff with a wealthy divorcee, his daughter, and her raging boyfriend.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Flame-Thrown for a Loop
programme.desc: Lou struggles to pick up the pieces after the accident leaves him needing Sonia more than ever. Lou and Carlos deal with a big man in a tiny car, but when Carlos lets his guard down he's delivered some serious blows.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Probation Abomination
programme.desc: Sonia returns, but not before putting the team on probation and laying some ground rules.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Love Potion No. 83
programme.desc: A love potion causes chaos.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Somebody’s Watching You
programme.desc: Nikki swears she’s witnessed a murder.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: A Sterling Relationship
programme.desc: Nikki charms Professor Oglevee’s older brother.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Amazing Grace
programme.desc: Nikki meets her guardian angel.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Join the Club
programme.desc: Nikki joins a snobby book club.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: From The Balcony
programme.desc: The dating game has Danni at a disadvantage when her feelings get the best of her. Andi tries to be strong for Gary. Karen stands strong on her principles. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Yellow Dress
programme.desc: Gary and Jasmine confront each other and the gloves come off. Andi struggles to maintain her career. Karen is confronted by a new enemy. Sabrina grows frustrated. (S1, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Home For A Queen
programme.desc: The ladies are concerned about Andi and her relationship choice. Sabrina stands strong for all of her friends who seem to be under attack. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction
programme.desc: PRS investigates the Campbell House, where the Innkeeper and guests claim to have sexual encounters with a spirit who has deep ties to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Carr House
programme.desc: Part of a once splendorous manor and a history that goes back as far as Robin Hood, Carr House is the sight of many a paranormal occurrence.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hill House_PT1
programme.desc: What was once a private home before becoming a sanctuary for the elderly, the abandoned Hill House is now an eerie shadow of its former glory, that houses empty rooms, strange noises and a plethora of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hill House_PT2
programme.desc: Part one saw the team seemingly getting stalked by something, and in this part it shows its hand.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Village Church Farm
programme.desc: A museum like no other, this small collection of antiquated buildings is said to be the home of several spirits. The team get more than they bargained for as objects move; strange noises are caught on camera and the best EVP response to date.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Old Nick Theatre
programme.desc: Once a prison and a police station and now a theatre the Old Nick is famous for its unexplained occurrences. Fred decides to summon up some extra help while objects move and something wants to make itself known.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Sail Away
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark assist a novelist who's given up. Also, they motivate the man's grandson, who has yet to tap into his literary potential.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Children's Children
programme.desc: A reporter uncovers a secret about the past of a woman who runs a home for unwed mothers.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Friends
programme.desc: While working as a substitute teacher at a high school, Jonathan assigns an overweight girl to tutor a troubled baseball star.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Special Love - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark persuade a youngster with Down's Syndrome to join the Special Olympics.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: For the Love of Larry
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark rescue victims trapped in a car, thanks to a helpful dog.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny returns to South Africa with Caroline, Liv and Charlotte. They are all excited to be back and are looking forward to seeing their new home, Clearwater Farm.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Danny has been preparing his pitch for an Endangered Species Project. JLW, a pharmaceutical company, are looking to fund an environmental project and the family hope that this grant money will enable them to buy Leopard's Den and Mara.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Ed release two cheetah brothers together, a symbol of their new partnership, but not all of the family are happy about this new start. Caroline is still furious at what she sees as Danny's betrayal of Du Plessis.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: The family are still estranged following Caroline's decision to move back to the decrepit Clearwater house with Du Plessis. Rosie is determined to reunite everyone, and plans a civilised dinner as a step towards reconciliation.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis is determined to prove his friend's innocence by any means he can. Du Plessis' first attempt backfires disastrously when he harangues a police officer and ends up in a cell next to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: With Danny away, and Du Plessis undertaking an ignominious stretch of community service, Ed is left in charge of running the Endangered Species Project.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Eyes of a Child
programme.desc: A loving, churchgoing grandmother is found stabbed to death in her apartment, leaving Joe Kenda to wonder what sort of monster could do such a thing.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Married To The Job
programme.desc: Sgt. Joe Kenda and his officers are facing off against a barricaded gunman when he gets an emergency call from his wife.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: When police find 24-year-old Patrick Ray with a gunshot to the temple, the scene has all the telltale signs of suicide. But Lt. Joe Kenda's instinct says otherwise.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Make My Day
programme.desc: When Keith Andrews is killed, a man steps forward claiming he did it in self-defense—but Lt. Joe Kenda has his doubts.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bad Blood

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Harley, Annabelle and Memphis

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Joe, and Penny, Roxy, Rico, Lou, & Solomon, and Promise
programme.desc: An Australian shepherd is so devoted to his owner that he breaks leashes to be with her; a neurotic beagle makes trouble for a pack of foster dogs; and an Italian mastiff puppy fears riding in cars.

programme.desc: Binky's family has decided to adopt a little girl from China. The thought of a baby sister makes Binky happy, until he realized there are some changes in store. It’s a lot harder than he thought, but it has its rewards too.

programme.title: Arthur: The Hallway Minotaur/Ladonna's Like List
programme.desc: Attention Lakewood Elementary! There's a new sheriff—er--hallway monitor-in town, and his name is George Lundgren. Ladonna Compson is friendly, funny, and full of personality. Everyone likes her! At least, that's what she thought.

programme.title: Arthur: Baby Kate and the Imaginary Mystery/Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: Nadine, D.W.'s imaginary friend is missing. Sue Ellen can't wait to travel on an old-fashioned train, but once onboard, she discovers that the train is not as spectacular as she had hoped–until she finds a mysterious diary.

programme.title: Arthur: When Duty Calls – Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: Ladonna finds out the Army is transferring her dad to Oregon, and the whole Compson family is moving again. Fern and the others can tell Ladonna is upset, but don’t know how to help. What can they do to make the transition easier?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Makes Waves/It Came From Beyond
programme.desc: With the community pool closed for repairs and the temperature on the rise, Arthur and D.W. need a place to keep cool. Then, Grandma Thora takes in a stray: an adorable little dog named...Killer?

programme.title: Arthur: Phony Fern/Brain's Shocking Secret
programme.desc: When Fern's parents give her a cell phone for emergencies, she soon becomes hooked on it. Brain is the smartest kid in class. Everyone knows that! What they don't know is that he was kept back in Kindergarten. Will Binky spill the beans?

programme.title: Arthur: Fernfern and the Secret of Moose Mountain/Thanks a Lot, Binky
programme.desc: Fern can't wait to climb Moose Mountain so that she can have adventures like Zutzut, the famous comic-book hero! Then, Binky decides to become "No More Mr. Nice Guy" after not getting thanked for saving Rattles from a dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Arthur: Maria Speaks/Postcards from Binky
programme.desc: Maria has always been a silent fixture in Mr. Ratburn's third-grade class. But her time to speak has finally come. Can she fix her stutter? When Binky's grandparents miss his big soccer game, he decides to film a video reenactment.

programme.title: Arthur: Lend Me Your Ear/The Butler Did It
programme.desc: Arthur, Buster, and Brain are worried when Mr. Ratburn isn't acting like himself. He's always pleased to see them, so what’s made him change? When Mr. Crosswire gets a robot butler for Father's Day, Muffy fears Bailey may be replaced.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Mount Belvedere

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies giggle together as they hold hands and side step around Home Hill. They watch three children build a jigsaw puzzle and try to guess what the picture is.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children dancing while King Pleasure and the Biscuit Boys play Hickory Dickory Dock. A voice trumpet appears and sings Hickory Dickory Dock.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch how some children who live on an island go to school by boat. A voice trumpet appears in Teletubbyland and the Teletubbies play a game called here and there.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Roads and Bridges
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Bob is going On Site! Join Bob and his Can-Do crew as they explore real life construction sites. See diggers, mixers and trucks work together to build roads and bridges.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a big day. The team are building Farmer Pickles new factory which will turn sunflowers into sunflower oil. Everyone is excited to meet Marjorie, who arrives by bicycle. Marjorie has been brought on board by Farmer Pickles to manage the factory.

programme.title: Knights of Can-A-Lot
programme.desc: Bob, Wendy and the team get a big surprise when Bob's father Robert comes to visit. When stern Ms Chalmers from the National Heritage asks Bob to renovate the old castle a case of mistaken identity leaves Bob’s father in charge!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a blistering hot day on Sunflower Valley. Bob and Wendy have got to finish building their workshop – making the workbenches and installing the power tools – it’s an inside job so the machines all get the day off.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is demolishing an old house, and sends the floorboards and roof tiles for recycling. As he finishes the job, he gets a call from Mr Bentley who wants him to renovate the museum’s annexe, where Mr Ellis plans to exhibit the work of local artists.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop is keen to enter the town’s snowman competition, but a burst pipe outside Mr Sabatini’s needs fixing. Scoop is anxious when he sees the snowman that Mr Sabatini has made for the competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Farmer Pickles is about to declare his Sunflower Oil business open, but there’s just one more job that he needs Bob to do. He needs a depot to store all the bottles of oil.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: An old Willow tree has toppled over and needs to be chopped down. Lofty and Bob are going to make it safe and use the wood for other things. Meanwhile Travis and Sumsy wonder why they haven’t got a shelter of their own like Bob’s machines.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is tiling a roof and calls at JJ’s yard to pick up the materials. But there is only one pallet of the requisite red tiles in stock, so JJ promises to send the remainder of the order as soon as his delivery arrives.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Its early morning and there’s a strange creature in Sunflower Valley. First of all it visits the Homestead and then Scarecrow Cottage scaring Sumsy and Travis. It’s something big and hairy, but gets frightened away by Scrambler carrying Baz.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Today’s the day that the machines get to build their brand new shelter. It’s going to be built into the side of a hill and made using found materials. Lofty, who slept outside at the old yard, decides that he’d like a place in the new shelter.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a big day, as the team are building Bob’s new workshop at his new yard. Scoop is desperate to get stuck in and beavers about doing everything he can to help. Bob needs some old floorboards collecting from Bobsville, and sends Scoop to pick them up.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a goat run for Farmer Pickles new goat – Giddy. It’s Travis’s job to collect Giddy from Meg MacDonald the goat breeder. Spud teases Travis about being slow and Travis resolves to collect the goat very quickly.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Wendy is making a floral display for the town square while Bob repairs a fence in Farmer Pickles’ field. Meanwhile, Spud comes across Mrs Percival putting up posters for the school play – The Three Musketeers.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are building a special flat-packed eco-home for Marjorie. When Muck and Benny spot Marjorie’s canvas tent and Spud’s straw-house, they wonder what else houses can be made from.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang leave to convert a house into two separate flats. Mr Bentley, meanwhile, has been left in charge of The Mayor’s dog.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Fothergill has a nasty case of dry rot, so Bob and crew will have to use some smelly chemicals to fix it. As these will affect Mr Fothergill’s allergies, he goes to his sister’s for the day. But she doesn’t get on with Hamish, his pet parrot.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: A Little Bit of Heaven

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Pad'ar

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: In Memory

programme.title: The Lost World: Mark of the Beast

programme.title: The Lost World: Survivors

programme.title: The Lost World: The Pirate's Curse

programme.title: The Lost World: The Visitor

programme.title: The Lost World: A Man of Vision
programme.desc: The five adventurers all experience visions of Summerlee, the companion they had presumed dead after he disappeared into a waterfall. They suffer injury and face danger as they pursue the vision.
